snippet.title: 15 of nature's most spectacular shows
snippet.description:
* Fireworks are fantastic and human endeavor has its place, but sometimes Mother Nature outshines any performance we can produce.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/22/travel/nature-must-see-shows/index.html

snippet.title: Best places to experience Native American culture
snippet.description:
* Think Native American culture has been co-opted by casinos, twisted by inaccurate films, relegated to the rez or buried with arrowheads?
http://www.cnn.com/2014/04/15/travel/best-usa-indian-culture/index.html

snippet.title: Congress seeking refunds for parks affected by shutdown
snippet.description:
* (CNN) - Spring officially starts Thursday. And as the snow melts, waterfalls gush, and plants begin to bloom, the country's national park system once again becomes a playground for millions eager to get back outside after a long, brutal winter...
http://politicalticker.blogs.cnn.com/2014/03/20/congress-seeking-refunds-for-parks-closed-during-shutdown/

snippet.title: America's best spring drives
snippet.description:
* Remember when Dorothy dozes off among scarlet poppies in The Wizard of Oz? Well, those vivid flowers weren't just a figment of Hollywood magic. Similar poppies set California's Antelope Valley ablaze in spring, luring road-trippers from L.A. and beyond.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/26/travel/best-spring-drives-america/index.html

snippet.title: Mitchell Casado, reluctant 'pilot of the people'
snippet.description:
* The disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 has propelled Mitchell Casado into the realm of aviation analyst celebrity -- and no one is more uncomfortable with that than Casado.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/31/world/asia/malaysia-airlines-flight-simulator-mitchell-casado-profile/index.html

snippet.title: 22 spots for spectacular starry skies
snippet.description:
* As the new series of "Cosmos" (only available to Fox viewers in the United States) seeks to unveil the wonders of the universe, you might be inspired to seek out these astronomical spectacles for yourself.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/12/travel/dark-sky-parks-and-reserves/index.html

snippet.title: 10 record-setting natural wonders in the United States
snippet.description:
* Maybe we've been cooped up too much this winter, but now more than ever, the natural wonders of our world are beckoning to us from behind gray computer monitors, buzzing cell phones and the million red brake lights ahead of us on the long commute home.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/06/travel/natural-records-united-states/index.html

snippet.title: 11 best ways to experience Hawaii
snippet.description:
* When visiting Hawaii, who doesn't imagine packing up and relocating to America's tropical wonderland?
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/13/travel/hawaii-ways-to-feel-local/index.html

snippet.title: Westboro church founder Fred Phelps dies
snippet.description:
* Fred Phelps -- the founding pastor of a Kansas church known for its virulently anti-gay protests at public events, including military funerals -- has died, the church said Thursday.
http://www.cnn.com/2014/03/20/us/westboro-church-founder-dead/index.html
